name: Plantlings
description:
Your houseplant Jerry has had babies and they are running rampage around your house! Take care of the plantlings so they can grow their leaves and be planted in their plant pot homes! 

Plantlings was made by Ryan; a software engineer with a couple of solo Ludum Dares under his belt, and Lucy; a chemist with no previous experience making games! We hope you enjoy what we've created! 

Use WASD or arrow keys to move
S to descend stairs
W or space to jump
E to throw

The game was made in Unity and the graphics were made in Inkscape. Sounds are royalty free from freesound.org. 

UPDATE:

Fix to prevent fatal WebGL crash
